basics.description: **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The [Google Workspace](https://workspace.google.com/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Google Workspace Activity events into Microsoft Sentinel. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Azure Monitor HTTP Data Collector API](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-collector-api) b. [Azure Functions](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/functions/#overview) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 10, **Hunting Queries:** 12 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

metadata.hidden: Hiding location, we get it from the log analytics workspace

basics.name: getLAWorkspace
basics.toolTip: This filters by workspaces that exist in the Resource Group selected

basics.name: workspace
basics.label: Workspace
basics.toolTip: This dropdown will list only workspace that exists in the Resource Group selected

options.text: The Google Workspace data connector allows you to easily to ingest Google Workspace Activity events into Microsoft Sentinel through the REST API. The connector provides ability to get events which help to examine potential security risks, analyze your team's use of collaboration, diagnose configuration problems, track who signs in and when, analyze administrator activity, understand how users create and share content, and review events in your organization. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
The solution installs a parser that transforms ingested data. The transformed logs can be accessed using the GWorkspace Kusto Function alias.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
Sets the time name for analysis
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.
Triggers on admin permissions granted.
Detects alert events.
Triggers when API Access has been granted to a new client.

elements.name: analytic4
elements.label: GWorkspace - User access has been changed

options.text: Detects user access change.

elements.name: analytic5
elements.label: GWorkspace - Multiple user agents for single source

options.text: Detects requests with different user agents from one source in short timeframe.

elements.name: analytic6
elements.label: GWorkspace - An Outbound Relay has been added to a G Suite Domain

options.text: Detects outbound relays may be added to collect email.
Detects possible brute force attack.

elements.name: analytic8
elements.label: GWorkspace - Possible maldoc file name in Google drive

options.text: Detects possible maldoc file name in Google drive.

elements.name: analytic9
elements.label: GWorkspace - Two-step authentification disabled for a user

options.text: Triggers on two-step authentification disabled for a user.
Detects unexpected OS update.
This solution installs the following hunting queries. After installing the solution, run these hunting queries to hunt for threats in Manage solution view.
Query searches document shared externally. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery2
elements.label: GWorkspace - Document shared publicy in web

options.text: Query searches document shared publicy  in web. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery3
elements.label: GWorkspace - Document shared publicy with link

options.text: Query searches document shared publicy with link. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery4
elements.label: GWorkspace - Multi IP addresses by user

options.text: Query searches users with multi IP addresses. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery5
elements.label: GWorkspace - Possible SCAM/SPAM or Phishing via Calendar

options.text: Query searches possible SCAM/SPAM or phishing via calendar. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery6
elements.label: GWorkspace - Rare document types by users

options.text: Query searches rare document types by users. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)
Query searches shared private document. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)
Query searches suspended users. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)
Query searches uncommon user agent strings. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)
Query searches unknown login type. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)

elements.name: huntingquery11
elements.label: GWorkspace - User reported calendar invite as spam

options.text: Query searches calendar invites used to deliver spam. This query shows results when user reports a calander invite as spam. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)
Query searches users with several devices. This hunting query depends on GoogleWorkspaceReportsAPI data connector (GWorkspaceActivityReports Parser or Table)
